title: Did Trump Threaten to Prosecute Anyone Who Damaged Federal Buildings?
subtitle: Many previous political tweets proved not to have aged well as chaos unfolded at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump once threatened that "anarchists, agitators, or protestors" who "vandalize or damage any federal buildings will be prosecuted."
